column4: I need some help guys, I switched from GDM to XDM on my "server", I connect to it from old laptops to use it's power, sort of like a thinclient/server
I need to know how i can fix the xdm settings from the CLI
ok, sethk does that work if i removed xdm and am using gdm now?
no reason to use XDM for that GDM can do everthing XDM can and its easyer to configure
